text: Love Happy is a 1949 American musical comedy movie directed by David Miller and starring Harpo Marx, Chico Marx, Groucho Marx, Vera-Ellen, Ilona Massey, Melville Cooper, Raymond Burr, Marilyn Monroe. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 comedy movies Category:1949 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by David Miller
title: Love Happy
